description: Students are assigned to a full-time internship in schools under the guidance of a competent cooperating teacher and supervised by faculty from both the content area department and the Education Department. Minimum of 6-12 full-time weeks teaching. Only student teachers may enroll: seniors or college graduates seeking an additional license. Offered each semester and during Interim. Cannot be taken concurrently with EDUC 389. Prerequisite: completion of EDUC 389 or equivalent.
name: Top: Student Teaching: Additional L
notes: Open to seniors in the professional semester only.
title: Student Teaching: Additional License
